languages.text: {n}Зашитые глаза Висиря словно бы внимательно всматриваются в ваше лицо. Изучают. Отвернувшись, он вновь произносит в пустоту:{/n} "Тише, брат мой. Время почти пришло".
{n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."
languages.original_text: {n}Зашитые глаза Висиря словно бы внимательно всматриваются в ваше лицо. Изучают. Отвернувшись, он вновь произносит в пустоту:{/n} "Тише, брат мой. Время почти пришло".

languages.text: {n}Die zugenähten Augen des Wesirs scheinen in dein Gesicht zu blicken. Es zu studieren. Dann wendet er sich ab und spricht wieder in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Friede, mein Bruder. Die Zeit ist fast gekommen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zugenähten Augen des Wesirs scheinen in dein Gesicht zu blicken. Es zu studieren. Dann wendet er sich ab und spricht wieder in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Friede, mein Bruder. Die Zeit ist fast gekommen."

languages.text: {n}Los ojos cosidos del Visir parecen fijarse en tu rostro, analizándolo. Después, se gira para volver a hablar con la nada.{/n} «Paz, hermano mío. Ya casi es el momento».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos cosidos del Visir parecen fijarse en tu rostro, analizándolo. Después, se gira para volver a hablar con la nada.{/n} «Paz, hermano mío. Ya casi es el momento».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールの縫い閉じられた目はあなたを覗き込んでいるようだ。探っている。そして背を向けると、再び何もない空間へと話しかける。{/n}「落ち着け、兄弟よ。その時は間もなくやってくる」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールの縫い閉じられた目はあなたを覗き込んでいるようだ。探っている。そして背を向けると、再び何もない空間へと話しかける。{/n}「落ち着け、兄弟よ。その時は間もなくやってくる」

languages.text: {n}宿老那双缝住的眼睛似乎在仔细观察着你的脸，认真研究。随后，他再次转过了身，对着空无一物的地方开了口。{/n}“安静点，我的兄弟。差不多是时候了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老那双缝住的眼睛似乎在仔细观察着你的脸，认真研究。随后，他再次转过了身，对着空无一物的地方开了口。{/n}“安静点，我的兄弟。差不多是时候了。”

languages.text: {n}Rivés sur votre visage, les yeux cousus du vizir étudient attentivement votre expression, puis il se détourne et s'adresse à nouveau à l'espace vide, à côté de lui.{/n} « Paix, mon frère. Nous y sommes presque. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rivés sur votre visage, les yeux cousus du vizir étudient attentivement votre expression, puis il se détourne et s'adresse à nouveau à l'espace vide, à côté de lui.{/n} « Paix, mon frère. Nous y sommes presque. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in dikilerek kapatılan gözleri, yüzüne dikkatle bakarak onu inceliyormuş gibi görünüyor. Ardından başını çevirip yeniden boşlukla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sakin ol kardeşim. Vakit neredeyse geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's sewn-shut eyes seem to peer into your face. Studying it. Then he turns away and speaks into empty space again.{/n} "Peace, my brother. The time has almost come."
